description: Jun`ichi is the protagonist of Da Capo as the student of Kazemi affiliated junior high class 3-1, whose role the player assumes. While loathing trouble and bother, he seldom turns his back on someone in need. Jun`ichi has the ability to utilize magic, he can create wagashi with magic at the dispense of calorie, as taught to him by him and Sakura`s grandmother. Like other characters, Jun`ichi is affected by the unwilting sakura tree, from which he gained his power to observe the dreams of other characters. He is one of the two returning characters in Da Capo II. Otome and Yume from Da Capo II are his granddaughters with Nemu.
name: Asakura Jun`ichi
